snippet: The dietary supplement maker at the center of a federal trial of former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife is halting sales of its product called Anatabloc....

headline.print_headline: Firm Halting Sales of Dietary Supplement Anatabloc
headline.main: Firm Halting Sales of Dietary Supplement Anatabloc

lead_paragraph: The dietary supplement maker at the center of a federal trial of former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife is halting sales of its product called Anatabloc.
